additional_info:
Jacuzzi, Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 This ultramodern apartment has a large open-plan studio-layout. The 151 meters includes a large living room/dining room, balcony, two large bedrooms, an open plan kitchen, a large bathroom and additional separate toilet.
It is on the 6th floor of the building and has great views. The apartment was formerly owned by footballer Davit Kipiani.
The main room has a central wall and fire-place that effectively splits the room in two, creating a dining room space and a living room space. At the balcony-end of the room are large multi-part glass doors that open up to allow the living room to extend onto the balcony.
